alert.note: Alert for Cassia; Power (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 6:32PM MDT until September 21 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Power County in southeastern Idaho... East central Cassia County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 632 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rockland, or 17 miles south of Neeley, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... American Falls, Neeley, western American Falls Reservoir, Rockland, Fort Hall Bannock Peak and Massacre Rocks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
